Reviews.Title: “Several glitches, poor service”
Reviews.Author: cqfp123
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights march 2012 excellent location walking distance leidseplein bustram stop 100 clean albeit comfortable albeit bed safe laptop complimentary wifi bad dimly lit difficult night hair dryer borrowed front desk waits elevator mediocre buffet breakfast worth 15 euros discounted rate 950 bathroom poorly designed sloping floor flooded shower ugly payment required time checkin receptionist applied dynamic currency conversion consent charged card usd instead euros resulted charge objected claimed required couldnt charge euros sic strong exception threatened dispute charge found charge euros phone didnt complain 2 told activate waiting hours repack change receptionist frequently front desk 1520 min time resulting waits key card 1st day resulted 30 min wasted speak manager told none available overall recommended

Reviews.Title: “Small dark rooms on a good location”
Reviews.Author: Hanna1144
Reviews.Content: stayed robert ramon conference september stayed obvious common dark clean single bit wardrobe bigger street quiet night opposite breakfast ok location hotel perfect minutes walk rijksmuseum vondelpark

Reviews.Title: “Misleading Review”
Reviews.Author: PhilENewYork
Reviews.Content: looking hotels amsterdam recent reviews property stayed location perfect common spaces nice tiny amsterdam standards colleague prison stay bathrooms equally tv wall price unless sleep common

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel 3* is about right.”
Reviews.Author: Danny787
Reviews.Content: amsterdam staying robert ramon hotel airport train central walk check 2 hotel drop bags 1st metro central 2 5 passed 40min walk amsterdam lost hotel look bigger using furniture thin modern hotel clean apart bathroom smashed glass bin 2nd day clever

Reviews.Title: “Neat room, good location, great sleep! - but not a 4* hotel!”
Reviews.Author: diana09Brussels
Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel super clean cosy beds comfy 3min walking leidsplein shopping bars restaurants van gogh etc hotel posh aread chanel louis vuitton class stores overall impression ive read reviews bit indeed specially triple 4star hotel logo hotel misleading 3 star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced, false advertisement”
Reviews.Author: fede123
Reviews.Content: stayed hundreds hotels robert ramon overpriced amsterdam 2 friends reserved triple 180 euros night struck sign outside hotel official 3 star rating website 4 star hotel lobby bland plain elevator real kicker idea triple single 3 beds third bed awkwardly placed lamp bedside flat screen tv mentioned website cheap tv im including picture cupboards dressers fit clothes 3 people complained receptionist cancel stay conveniently robert ramon charges stay soon check wonder probably deal lot clients money told able refund day 48 hour cancellation policy rate night told booked looked website look website mind false advertisement claiming 4 star hotel amsterdam price hotel 180 euros goes ripped yourself favor stay piet hein 2 blocks robert ramon

Reviews.Title: “I can recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: RenataPoland
Reviews.Content: location perfect hotel nice refurbished bathrooms look oldish clean day hot water return received free breakfast noisy facing street tram hotel provided ear plugs slept baby didt hotel scrambled eggs artificial eatable overally hotel price amsterdam definitly stay robert ramon

HotelInfo.Name: Robert Ramon Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: P.C. Hofstraat 24-28, Amsterdam 1071 BX, The Netherlands
